resources.string: Click the camera button to take a snapshot of the ingredients list of a product. The list of identified ingredients will appear on the bottom.
Click the camera button to take a snapshot of the ingredients list of a product. The list of identified ingredients will appear on the right.
The application requires a write access to external storage to store its database and photos
Permission not granted. The application will not function properly until permission is granted.
The application requires access to the camera to take snapshots of lists of ingredients
Permission not granted. You will only be able to add ingredients manually to the list of ingredients.
